question:
A problem has occurred on the road outside your house. Write a letter to  the local councilor. In your letter
-Introduce yourself 
-Explain the problem
-State what action you would like him to take
text: I am writing to you regarding a recent racial fight that has occurred yesterday in front of the street where my home is located.

About myself, I, Toriqul, Byron, am a resident, who live in this area for 10 years now and have no issues with any of my neighbours up to now. That is why I believe that I am living in a peaceful community where everyone is respected.

My neighbours have participated in a foul-mouthed  argument last week, which lead to the fight and one of them has ended up in hospital now. Therefore, people’s are agitated as Mr Kali attacked Mr Brian due to racial slurs while I was watching this incident.
Consequently, I would be happy if you take the necessary steps to sort this issue on a positive note, which could defuse the current situation in the community.
